About the designer: The Row was established in 2006 by industry icons Ashley Olsen and Mary-Kate Olsen. Named in reverence of London's Savile Row, the fashion house emulates the bespoke standards of exceptional fabrics, impeccable details, and precise tailoring. The Row combines a timeless perspective with subtle attitudes which form an irreverent classic signature. The Row’s collections also explore the strength of simplistic shapes that speak to discretion and are based on uncompromising quality.

The Navy Aurora Midi Dress is the perfect event dress for weddings, luncheons, and soirees! With a halter neckline, thin straps that you can tie two ways, and a tiered skirt, this soft midi will keep you comfortable so you can dance all night long! Pair with chunky heels and statement earrings for an elevated, versatile look. products.description: Use at night. Apply to clean skin in areas where treatment is needed. Leaveon. Do not apply a moisturizer on top. Use sunscreen prior to sun exposure. If you are new to retinol, consider a patch test. Start by applying The Body Retinol once a week, graduating to every other night. Key Ingredients + Benefits: 0.1% Pure Encapsulated Retinol helps repair crepiness, lines, spots, scars, and bumps. 10% AHA, Mandelic Acid, and Glycolic Acid, help prepare skin’s surface for retinol. 5 Peptides and Vitamins support skin repair ingredients.
